short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open any image on the web in picture-in-picture (PIP)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚠️ Extension is deprecated and no longer maintained ⚠️

---

This extension lets you open images in Picture-in-Picture.

How to use:
1. Right click the picture you wish to open in PIP
2. Click the "Open image in Picture-in-Picture" button

Source code: https://github.com/VictorWesterlund/ppip
